title: Say Hello To Serious Sam | Shankland vs Liang | US Championship 2018.
description:
#agadmator The 2018 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

For the 10th consecutive year the Saint Louis Chess Club is hosting the event. Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

Samuel Shankland vs Awonder Liang
US Championship (2018), St Louis, MO USA, rd 1, Apr-29 
Caro-Kann Defense: Exchange. Rubinstein Variation (B13)

1. e4 c6 2. d4 d5 3. ed5 cd5 4. Bd3 Nc6 5. c3 Nf6 6. Bf4 Bg4 7. Qb3 e5 8. h3 ef4 9. hg4 Qe7 10. Kf1 O-O-O 11. Nd2 g6 12. Re1 Qc7 13. g5 Nh5 14. Be2 Ng7 15. Ngf3 Ne6 16. Bb5 Bg7 17. Qa4 Rd6 18. Nb3 b6 19. Nc1 Nb8 20. Nd3 Kb7 21. Nb4 Qd8 22. Ne5 Qc7 23. Qb3 Rhd8 24. Rh7 a6 25. Bd3 Ka7 26. Qa4 a5 27. Bb5 Kb7 28. Nbd3 Rg8 29. Nf3 Rh8 30. Rh8 Bh8 31. a3 Nc6 32. Bc6 Rc6 33. Nde5 Be5 34. Ne5 Rd6 35. Qe8 Rd8 36. Qf7 Ng5 37. Qc7 Kc7 38. Ng6 f3 39. Nf4 Kc6 40. gf3 Nf3 41. Re6 Kb5 42. Ke2 Ng1 43. Kd3
